author: wsjcom
title: Longer, Heavier Trucks Are a Serious Hazard
text:
The public should urge their lawmakers to oppose efforts by FedEx and UPS to increase the national twin-trailer standard to 33 feet from 28 feet per trailer (Letters, Feb. 6). Granting this corporate giveaway will permit longer trucks on our roads, which will erode safety and adversely affect our nationâ€™s infrastructure.
